QuestData.Title: A Standard Day for Azrajar
QuestData.Description: $n, the naga are after our forces. I need you to go back northwest to Deepfin Ridge and stick our standard in their general, Fathom-Caller Azrajar.$B$BThey'll swim away with their tails tucked between their... er. Well, I guess they don't have any legs, now do they?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Plant a banner in his corpse!
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant the Horde Standard in Fathom-Caller Azrajar's corpse.
QuestData.CompletionText: First you need to kill Azrajar. Then, you take the pointy end of the banner and you stick it in him.
QuestData.RewardText: Stuck him right through, did you? I would have loved to have seen that!

Objectives.Objective: Banner planted in Fathom-Caller Azrajar's corpse
